Package agent

Package agent contains classes for handling business logic.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agent
    Agent: abstract class for chatbot Agent.
    CampaignManager
    CampaignManager: manage sharing, coupon claiming and coupon image upload.
    FeedbackManager
    Generate user weight line chart and nutrient pie chart.
    FoodRecommender
    FoodRecommender: calculate scores for each dish and generate reasons for recommendation.
    ImageMenuParser
    ImageMenuParser: parser image into JSONArray using OCR and SpellChecker.
    InitialInputRecorder
    UserInitialInputRecorder: handle user initial input.
    IntentionClassifier
    IntentionClassifier: classifier intention of the user and change global state.
    MealAsker
    MealAsker: interact with user to get the appropriate menu.
    MealRecorder
    MealRecorder: record the dish user ate.
    MenuManager
    MenuManager: wrapper for MenuKeeper.
    MenuParser
    MenuParser: handle menu in text, url and image.
    PortionAsker
    PortionAsker: ask portion size of each dish.
    TextMenuParser
    TextMenuParser: handles text menu.
    UrlMenuParser
    UrlMenuParser: parser menu from URL.
    UserManager
    UserManager: handling user follow and unfollow event.

Package agent Description

Package agent contains classes for handling business logic. It includes classes for user interaction, food recommendation, etc.
